backend.tradesystem.suggestion_strategies

Interface SuggestTradeStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExactWishlistSuggestion, SimilarWishlistSuggestion

    public interface SuggestTradeStrategy
    Interface which has a suggestTrade method that represents a suggestTrade algorithm

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String[] suggestTrade(java.lang.String thisTraderId, boolean inCity)
      Suggests a trade where thisTraderId is offering some item to another trader.

    • Method Detail

      • suggestTrade

        java.lang.String[] suggestTrade(java.lang.String thisTraderId,
                                boolean inCity)
                         throws UserNotFoundException,
                                AuthorizationException
        Suggests a trade where thisTraderId is offering some item to another trader.
        Parameters:
        thisTraderId - the id of the trader asking for the suggestion
        inCity - true if you desire to search for other traders within the same city as the original trader
        Returns:
        A trade suggestion in the form of [fromUserId, toUserId, lendItemId, receiveItemId]
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if a user was not found
        AuthorizationException - if the given trader id represents a non-trader object.
